head.supplied: Melbourne, ¶ bot Gardens Museum ¶ 4/8/73 ¶ Sir ¶ ¶ I have the honor to solicit, that you will be pleased to place under authority of expenditure such portion of the votes sanctioned for my Department...

div.p: D73/10017, unit 669, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

I have the honor to solicit, that you will be pleased to place under authority of expenditure such portion of the votes sanctioned for my Department, as you may deem desirable, in order that I may from month to month pass the accounts for salaries of myself, my assistant and museum & office attendent, also the amounts incurred for incidental expenses, stores or other official liabilities.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: I have the honor to be,
